price: 100. Ama korosuy jahannam girai diggalsimta tet addal Qansari gibdah kaxxam iihisaanaah sinkibo Ion, usun tet addal tu- mayaabban digaala gibday keenit takkeh.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
